channel.title: Inje-gun on Every Corner of Korea

item.title: Healing trek to the white birch forest - Inje-gun, Gangwon-do, Korea
item.description:
‘The Whispering Birch Forest’ Landscape

Healing trek to the white birch forest

Inje-gun, Gangwon-do, Korea

A train running through the vast snow fields of Siberia. The scene that conveys the coolness of the air in the movie was the most striking trees in the white snow field that filled the train. An unusual scene that occupies a scene of the winter landscape in memory, if you can see it on the earth? Hearing rumors, he set out. Go to Inje Wondaeri Birch Forest.

In winter, there is a brighter landscape. A scene like “Winter Fairy Tale” depicted by trees that stretch out with white snow and dazzling white flesh in them. You may have come across a movie in the background of a cold country. The immaculate trees filled with such white snow provided a vivid and familiar winter image for us born and raised on this earth. Furthermore, naturally, it made me think, 'I want to see this winter scenery someday.' Unfortunately, it is not easy to see trees with such white skin on the earth.

In search of a birch tree with a beautiful white skin

The identity of the snow that makes the snow glow is a birch. If you look at him with a bright, shiny white tree trunk that grows up to 20 meters, it seems that you faced 'Eom Chin-ah' with a perfect expression from head to toe. First of all, it looks great. The body is stretched without knowing the sky high. And fine (white) skin. It will fold a number in appearance. (Like a handsome man) What if it's useless? It's just a good thing to see. But this is not all. Oak Tree A member of the birch family 'Birch' is a useful plant in many ways.

Birch forest called 'the queen of the forest'

Birch, as hard as birch, is great for making furniture. The white and shiny shell was well-fired and was useful as a fire fighter. The name birch is also said to be burning with the sound of 'birch'. In addition, his epidermis, which is thinly peeled off like paper, was used to draw or write on paper as a substitute. A part of Hapyeong Haeinsa's Palmman Daejanggyeong was also known as birch, and the material of Cheonmado, which decorated the horse saddle of Cheonmachong in Gyeongju, is also a birch bark. Even now, there were no birch trees in Silla's royal road, Gyeongju. Where did this birch come from?

Wondari Birch Forest

If you look at this, you can see one thing. Birch trees grow in cold places. There are also birch communities in Korea. Most of them are located in the mountainous regions of the north of the central part. In South Korea, they can be seen in the mountainous regions of Gangwon-do such as Taebaek, Hoengseong and Inje. Among them, Inje is regarded as a representative birch colony.

Wondae Forest Monitoring Post
There are two known birch trees in Inje. One is located in Susan-ri at the foot of Eungbong-san and the other is located in Wondae-ri. Although Susan-ri is a colony with a little more birch trees, this time we decided to look at Wondae-ri, which is easier to find.
The way to Wondae-ri birch forest
Confess before going on a full-scale trek. The entrance to the Birch Forest in Wondaeri is controlled during the forest fire period (February 1 to May 15, November 1 to December 15). The period of viewing the picturesque birch forest in the white snow is 45 days from December 16 to January 31. This means that you must wait until December to see the winter landscape of Wondari Birch Forest.
Walk about 3.5km from Wondae Forest Monitoring Post
A fantasy forest where a fairy will pop out of 'tuk'

Wondae-ri birch forest is located at '75 -22 Won-dae-ri '. The road is not difficult. You can start with 'Wondaeri Forest Monitoring Post'. After making a guestbook at the guard post, it goes up along the forest road of about 3.5km. The path that runs smoothly along the hillside is a path that can be easily walked by both men and women. But if you visit here in winter, spats and crampons are a must. There are many people looking for, but it is a snowy road that has been compacted by people's footprints, but it is much easier to focus on trekking in case the cold snow will wet your instep.

The further away from the entrance faced by the province, the quieter. Birch trees that reveal white flesh like white flesh begin to appear one by one. It's a good way to walk. How long did you walk? At the end of my sweat, I pass the toilet and face the 'whispering birch forest'.

What should I say. Thousands of birch trees fill the white snow. It seems that if you enter the forest, the fairy will jump out here and there. Since it began to be boiled in the early 1990s, young birch trees that have just passed over are now known to the public in October 2012. When I entered the whispering birch forest, I understand why the birch is called the “queen of trees,” and the birch forest is called the “white rice of the forest.” It is a landscape without words.

When you enter the forest, there are three walking courses: birch course (0.9km), healing course (1.5km), and exploration course (1.1km). Since they are connected to each other without any distinction, it is a good idea to walk through the birch forest regardless of the course. I feel like I'm facing the scenery I've only seen with movies or photos. Don't forget to touch the fine cuticle of the birch when you enter the forest. Don't miss looking up at the tall, high-nosed tip of the birch tree that filled the blue sky. The picture comes out no matter how you take it. If you still want to take great photos, take a wide-angle lens. Climb to the shelter's cabin, rest your neck and rest for a while.

The birch forest in winter, which embraces a landscape that has never been experienced, provides rest and healing in itself. The troublesome thoughts that fill my head disappear by themselves. Is this something like “healing from nature” that I only heard in words? After a long time in the birch forest, I return to the road, and I keep looking back. 7km round-trip from forest post to birch forest. Trekking takes 2 hours, but depending on the length of time you stay in the birch forest, the total time required varies. Why don't you try harder this year and start looking for Wondae-ri birch forest around December when winter comes again? Recalling the birch flower saying, “I am waiting for you.”

Near the top of the birch community
Travel information

Northern Regional Forest Service Inje Imperial Forest Management Office (Contact)

033-460-8036

1.Nearby Restaurants

Dongjaksanchaechon: Sanchae cuisine / Girinmyeon, Girin-myeon / 033-463-8484

Potatoes: Freshwater Maeuntang / Deoksan-ro, Inje-eup / 033-462-5766

http://www.finevalley.co.kr/

item.title: A wild variety loved winter destination… NO.1 is Gangwon-do - Inje-gun, Gangwon-do, Korea
item.description:
<One Night Two Days> selected winter destination in Inje, Gangwon-do <Photo courtesy, KBS PR room>

A wild variety loved winter destination… NO.1 is Gangwon-do

Inje-gun, Gangwon-do, Korea

Corianders say. About ‘the taste of winter travel’. We, afraid of cold wind and cold, turn on the TV in the warm lower neck. This is because you can enjoy the winter scenery while watching KBS <Day 1, 2 Days>, which reached Season 3, and MBC's <Daddy, Where>, where you can see the cute little kids' growth. Sometimes I think of 'I'll go once' while watching delicious food or a great winter scenery. So I looked. Where are their favorite winter destinations?

When did it start? On the ground TV, outdoor programs that claimed the 'wild variety show' appeared. There were often programs to introduce destinations as a vacation or holiday special. However, the background is the main character and the survivors of the broadcasters unfolding in this raw space came with a different fun in the name of 'wild variety'. There were a lot of broadcasts even if I added cable broadcasting, but this article will focus on KBS <1 Night 2 Days> which started in 2007 and MBC's <Daddy, Where>, which started in 2013.

Travel season with no difference between low season and high season… Still, winter travel is difficult?

Viewers who laughed after watching their lives and playing games to sleep in a warm room in the cold of the cold were interested in the “space” where they headed and stayed. In the late 2000s, when the IMF (International Monetary Fund surge) began to take an interest in 'climbing', people became increasingly interested in professional equipment and the 'outdoor frenzy' hit the land. Nowadays, from middle and high school students to 20s and 30s, they use outdoor jackets for various ages, but even 10 years ago, if they were “climbing clothes,” they would be considered as “clothes worn by uncles”.

Each traveler and every traveler has a style to pursue, but in general, it is not necessary to have detailed information when traveling by car to destination to enjoy the scenery and time there. However, as you travel, the moment comes when you want to jump directly into the picturesque landscape. I wondered when the sun was rising and where I was standing. If you look at <1 Night 2 Days> or <Daddy, Where Going>, you will have a blood clot over a place to sleep. During this process, viewers will naturally learn various information about the space. It is not related to the role of the exposed space at this time that people find their destination.

<2 days and 1 night> Season 3 <Photo courtesy, KBS PR room>
The technology of travel that was strengthened by actual camping

The wild variety's most used formula is to let people in the game go to bed outdoors. Sleeping outdoors without a tent is called ‘bivouac’. It is usually a way for professional climbers to go to bed while barely avoiding wind while climbing. In other words, it means falling asleep with a blanket over the sky and a pillow over the ground. Of course, in the case of <2 days and 1 night> and <Dad, where are you going>, there were times when there were tents, but for those who have never done camping properly, it is no different from Bibak.

KBS <1 night 2 days> Travel destination Inje, Gangwon-do <Photo courtesy, KBS PR room>

Is it because of the definite prior learning produced as a 'video' about the destination? It seems that people no longer think of travel as difficult. Instead, I think that I can think of it as a familiar space that I already know, that I can leave at any time. Because I was exposed to advance information through a program aired on TV. I was curious to comment this long. What winter destinations were introduced through programs such as KBS <1 Night 2 Days> and MBC <Daddy, Where Are You>? Here are some of the wild variety's favorite winter destinations. <Daddy, Go Where>, which would have been of interest to families with children, added for a family trip.

KBS <1 night 2 days> Travel destination Inje, Gangwon-do <Photo courtesy, KBS PR room>
Outdoor sleeping is directly connected to camping. In order to enjoy camping, which is considered the best part of outdoor activities, you must basically enjoy traveling and go beyond the stage of enjoying the trip. This is because, even if it is a fixed time, it requires a little bit of pitting to stand up in nature. (Of course, some people start camping.)
KBS <1 night 2 days> Travel destination Inje, Gangwon-do <Photo courtesy, KBS PR room>
The real information that goes out into the mountains, fields and outdoors and hits it with my body is alive with information from camping and other outdoor activities. The wild variety such as <2 days and 1 night> met this process, that is, the process of "going to travel masters," which we had to go through, and people began to travel to find the destination introduced on TV. (This may mean that there was no travel guidebook that stimulated people's curiosity.)
KBS <1 night 2 days> Travel destination Inje, Gangwon-do <Photo courtesy, KBS PR room>
Wild variety winter destination NO.1 is Gangwon-do
Let's take a look at MBC's <Dad, Where I Go>, which started in January 2013 and has a small amount of broadcasting. The first winter trip with young children was 'Oegeulgeori', an outback town in Chuncheon, Gangwon-do. The kid who still shed tears like chicken poop is still good for his eyes that he stayed overnight in the poorest house.
Inje smelt festival boasts the best popularity in winter
The Chuncheon Lake, which was selected as a winter destination, showed a tent on a ice plate and catching a smelt. Every winter, the Sancheoneo Festival was held in Hwacheon, Gangwon-do, the Smelt Festival was held in Inje and Chuncheon, and the Trout Festival was held in Pyeongchang. In addition, Gangwon Jeongseon and Wondeokcheon Village and Dumori in Cheongwon, Chungbuk were introduced as winter destinations for Dad and Where. In addition, Jeju Island, a warm southern country, was selected as the last destination of Season 1.
Hwacheon Sancheoneo Fish Festival, the most popular winter season

From now on, let's take a look at the region selected as a winter destination in <2 days and 1 night>. This winter, I went to the Namwon Snake Valley and the Gyeongbobi Ice Wall in Yangju, Gyeonggi Province. Of these, the place where winter color is properly revealed is the ice barrier. The appearance of an old actor who screamed in a whale watching a dolphin hanging over a rocky ice wall where people who enjoy extreme outdoor can enjoy “Ice Climbing”, which they will not forget in the winter, left a new laughter and a place in mind.

Taebaeksan, Gangwon, loved by snow mountain hiking

In 2012, we visited Yanggu in Gangwon, Hwangtae village in Inje, Gyeongpodae beach and Buyeondong village in Odaesan. In addition, Hongseong in Chungnam, Gyeongsang area introduced Tongyeong and Pohang, Guryongpo, Jeonnam Jangheung, Seoul Gyeongbokgung and Jongmyo. In winter, how many people have not tasted it again after seeing Hwangtae-deokjang that fills the mountain valley of Gangwon-do? Gangwon-do, one of the most popular snow trekking spots in Daedae, and Tongyeong and Pohang, where delicious water and gwamegi await.

Deokyusan, Muju, Jeonbuk

Not only that. In 2011, Gangwon-do visited Cheorwon Mintong Line, Taebaeksan Mountain, Chuam · Gyeongpodae Beach in the East Sea, Garisan Natural Recreation Forest in Hongcheon, and Seoraksan Mountain. Introduced Gunsan Geumgang Lake in Jeonbuk, Boryeong Hodo in Chungnam, Tongyeong Retail Water and Ulleungdo in Gyeongsang area, Sonjukdo in Yeosu and Jeju Island in Jeonnam. In 2010, when there were many missions where members were torn apart, Incheon, Daejeon, Daegu, Busan, Ulsan, and Gwangju were introduced, as well as Jeju, Gyeongbuk Andong, Jeonnam Sinan Heuksando, and Gyeonggi Gapyeong Calbongsan. Following 2008, which visited Nokdo and Oeyeondo in Haeram, Haenam, Jeollanam-do, and Yeonseongdo in Boryeong, Hwacheon, Gangwon Hwacheon, and Uljin and Jeonnam, Gyeongsangbuk-do, in 2009, in 2009, Gangwon Morning Garrigol, Jeonnam Yeosu Geomundo, Jeonnam Boseong, and Damyang left.

Gyeongbuk Ulleungdo is considered a winter destination

The most introduced regions as winter destinations were the islands of Gangwon-do where you can enjoy both mountains and the sea, and the islands of the South and West Seas that can organize the year. Gangwon-do, which embraces the East Sea closest to the downtown area of the metropolitan area, has become a town that can be visited enough for a day trip in the “Maika” era. Where is summer only? In winter, it is overflowing with skiers at the foothills of Gangwon-do and visitors to the popular East Sea sea during the season. Gangwon-do, which has long been regarded as a barren land, has settled as a 'travel destination' with various images by maximizing the natural environment he embraced in the 21st century. The wild variety show did not miss his advantage. Why don't you take your own “wild variety” trip this weekend, a winter destination that has been steamed for a while?


※ The above information was created in January 2014, and may change later, so be sure to check it before you travel.

item.title: Bang Tae-san Natural Recreation Forest - Inje-gun, Gangwon, South Korea
item.description:
Fall of Bangtae Mountain

Bang Tae-san Natural Recreation Forest

Inje-gun, Gangwon, South Korea

Bang Tae-san is a natural beauty when hit by humans. Often, when you meet a beauty, you can't even know 'wow' and admiration comes out. This is the case with Bang Tae-san. My heart beats up and down the moment I see it. If you ask for a night in the backcountry landscape, you will dream of autumn leaves.
Two-stage waterfall and autumnal world
The road to see the beauty is long and rough. After exiting the expressway from Donghongcheon IC, the remaining distance for navigation is 61km. The vagueness that there is a place where you have to run an hour and a half after getting off the expressway in the times when the highway stretches up and down for a while, grabs the handle and enjoys the excitement toward the back country. The closer you get to Mt. Taetae, the farther it is from the expressway. On the side of the winding road, the descending river and Bangdong Valley spread out the pristine landscape. While immersed in the scenery, we arrive at Bangtaesan Natural Recreation Forest ticket office without any boredom.
The maple leaves greet you first
Did you say 'land from heaven, Inje'? On the way to the campsite past the ticket booth, people who are so close to this beautiful landscape begin to spring. The foliage is lined up on both sides of the street to welcome.
Valley colored with autumn leaves
At the ticket booth, you'll be welcomed by the maple trees. It is the most beloved place in Bangtaesan Natural Recreation Forest. In particular, in autumn, the heresy falls to the point of performing orchestras. The main character on the stage decorated with colorful autumn leaves is a waterfall that falls to heresy. In front of the stage is a crowd of clouds. He constantly presses the camera shutter toward the main character who unfolds a white thread in heresy. Similar to the airport where the idol star appeared.
Ethanol Falls, a trademark of Bangtaesan Natural Recreation Forest
A waterfall of 10m and 3m high water falls into heresy and the collaborative performance of the maple forest that surrounds it are the works of the gods that fascinate. Wash away the old thoughts fluttering in the sound of the cool water and be a romantic lover of the pieces of autumn leaves.
Falls and Falls
Even if you're not a photographer, you can put a picture of a two-level waterfall with autumn leaves in your chest.
Scenery to put in the chest
Go a little further past the campsite from heresy falls to the forest exploration trail. The Forest Experience Trail, which starts from the parking lot above the 2nd Campsite, is a promenade that allows you to appreciate the unexplored mountains of Bangtae Mountain. It's only 2km away, so a slow pace of 1 hour is enough. But it's not just an hour. It is an hour to admire interjection all along the walk.
Forest Experience Trail with Foliage Tunnels
Autumn in Jeokgargol is the world of autumn leaves. The first step on the promenade makes you feel as if you are in a different world. It is a waste to walk the scenery where the pure valley like the ancient times is colored with red leaves. Even if you walk slowly, you want to walk more slowly.
1 hour of autumn leaves along the forest trail
If you like to hike, you can walk all the way to the sum peak. The hiking trail that leads to Maebong-ryeong, Guryongdeok-bong, and Jueumbong-bong takes 10.2km and takes about 6 hours.
Visitors who can't leave their enemies
Join the forest commentary at 10 am every day to get closer to nature. At 2 pm, there will be a woodworking experience to make pencil holders and key chains.
Forest Commentary and Woodworking Experience
Holy Land of Camping in Autumn
For those who enjoy camping, spending a night at Bangtaesan Natural Recreation Forest with beautiful autumn leaves is a wish that you want to achieve once. The campsite sits in a maple forest next to the valley, so where is the better place? It is the land of Bae-pung-byeong, which is comparable to the name of Baesan-byeong. When you open the tent door, clear water flows through the pristine valley, and as you look up, the forest of burning autumn leaves spreads out.
Campsite for dream camping under the foliage forest
The camping site is divided into the first camping site across from the resort and the second camping site past the two-stage waterfall. There are a total of 50 decks, 10 at the 1st campsite and 40 at the 2nd campsite. The first campsite is better for relatively quiet camping. The second campsite is close to the two-tier waterfall and forest trail, which is good for walking around the autumn leaves.
Campground morning with colored leaves
The deck size is relatively small, 3.6m × 3.7m and 3.6m × 3.0m, so minimalist camping is suitable. There are three bathrooms and two kitchens, and one shower room is located at the second campsite. You can't park your car right next to the tent, but it's relatively close, so it's a good idea for auto camping. It is a pity that there is no hot water and electric facilities, but as it is a camping nearer to nature, it lasts for a long time. Warm sleeping bags are essential at this time of year when the temperature drops sharply.
Tents under the autumn leaves
There is a house in the forest and a forest culture and recreation center where you can enjoy a night in the autumn leaves without camping. In the forest house there is one 12 person room of 83m2, and the forest culture and recreation hall in the form of tenement houses has four 5 ~ 6 person rooms of 29㎡ and five 6 ~ 8 person rooms of 39㎡. There are small attic rooms for six to eight people who need to climb a ladder. Reservations can be made on the National Natural Recreation Forest website. However, Tuesday is closed.
Cooking at the campsite
If you had a honey-like night at Bangtaesan Recreation Forest, it's time to take a tour of the attractions of Inje. First of all, it is 5 minutes away. Because of its high carbonate content, sugar is famous for its delicious cider. Bear Beard, famous for its wildflowers, is 40 minutes away and Park In-hwan Literature Museum is an hour away. You can not miss the one-handed birch forest. The birch grove, called “Aristocracy of the Forest,” is an exotic landscape where visitors from all seasons line up.
Forest Culture Recreation Center
Travel info

Bangtaesan Natural Recreation Forest
Address: 241 Bangtaesan-gil, Girin-myeon, Inje-gun, Gangwon-do
Contact: 033-463-8590


1. Nearby restaurants

Vibrating Sanchae: 1073, Jochimyeong-ro, Girin-myeon, Inje-gun / 033-463-8484
